name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Adam MIELNICKI, Appellant

judges: CASTILLE, C.J., SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, MCCAFFERY, STEVENS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Adam MIELNICKI, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been IMPROVIDENTLY GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Carolyn Ann Castagna, Esq., Brian J. Zeiger, Esq., Levin & Zeiger, L.L.P., for Mielnicki, Adam.
